war.gui

Class WarGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • war.gui.WarGui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, WarView

    public class WarGui
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements WarView, java.lang.Runnable
    Assignment #10
    GUI Implementation of "War" card game.
    See Also:
